scenario_name: Model Inversion Attack on Customer Churn Prediction
description: A malicious actor attempts to reconstruct sensitive customer data from a deployed customer churn prediction model using a model inversion attack.  The attacker leverages carefully crafted inputs to the model and analyzes the outputs to infer private customer information, such as income brackets or purchase history.
initial_goal: Evaluate the robustness of the customer churn prediction model against adversarial attacks.
enterprise_context: Investment/Consumer Banking: Customer churn prediction model deployed for proactive retention strategies. The model uses anonymized customer data but is vulnerable to a model inversion attack that could reveal sensitive income and spending patterns.
